plot_summary: A sweet story that highlights the importance of never giving up on your dreams. Be inspired by Penelope as she dares to dream BIG, overcomes adversity, and finds the courage to remain true to herself.Major themes in this book include dreams and goals, peer pressure, self-awareness and courage.Penelope is a curious, fun-loving little girl who is accompanied by her dream wherever she goes. Everything was going well for her until she realized that her dream had grown WAY TOO BIG. Feeling embarrassed of so much attention, she decided to leave her dream behind so she could fit in with others.Join Penelope in this sweet story of self awareness to find out what happens to her and her beloved dream.  Read more
review_title: A message we all need to hear!
review_content: We love this book ! The story is so sweet and easy for kids to follow but the message is one that both kids and adults can appreciate . The illustrations are colorful and expressive and add so much to the message of this story . reminds us that we all need to keep space for our big dreams even when life tries to get in the way !

review_title: Wonderful book for kids and parents about the importance of having aspirations and confidence!
review_content: I love how this book takes complex topics such as aspirations , goals and dreams and simplify it for kids to understand and possibly start meaningful conversation about it . It reminds both kids and parents how important it is to have confidence in yourself and dream about something even though it might sometimes be further off in the future !
